description:
Speaker: Nicholas Tollervey

If you teach, if you Python — join us for a whirlwind tour of this year's Python Education Summit.

Slides can be found at: https://speakerdeck.com/pycon2016 and https://github.com/PyCon/2016-slides
title: Nicholas Tollervey - Education Summit wrap-up: teaching Python — how hard can it be? - PyCon 2016
